name: Seventy Apostles
father Theoctistus, Hegumen of the Cucomo Monastery in Sicily
troparia: (Tone 3) O holy apostles, intercede with the all-merciful God,* that He may grant us forgiveness of our sins.

(Tone 4) Make ready, O Zabulon,* and prepare yourself, O Nephtali;* O River Jordan, stop and receive with joy* the Master coming to be baptized.* O Adam, rejoice with the first mother, Eve,* and do not hide yourselves as before in Paradise.* For, having seen you unclothed,* Christ has appeared to clothe you with the first robe;* He has appeared to renew all creation.
kontakia: (Tone 2) Come, you faithful people.* Let us praise the seventy disciples of Christ with heavenly hymns.* Through them we have come to adore the Holy Trinity,* and they are still a light of faith for us.
(Tone 4) Today the Lord stood in Jordanâ€™s current telling John:* Do not be afraid to baptize Me,* for I have come to save Adam, the first man.
